instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Mac Mini recognizes earphones, but doesn't play sound through them.
threads.message: Hey guys. I have a mac mini here that plays normal sound through speakers and external display however, when earphones are plugged in, it shows that the earphones are connected but it doesn't play any sound through them. The I/O bezel and logic board seemed good, so i went ahead and set up a new OS however, the problem still exists. Any further troubleshooting tips?

threads.title: Mac Mini recognizes earphones, but doesn't play sound through them.
threads.message: Oh a Mac Mini, I wonder which one.....

threads.title: Mac Mini recognizes earphones, but doesn't play sound through them.
threads.message: Mac Mini Late 2014. Model A1347 - EMC - 2840.

threads.title: Mac Mini recognizes earphones, but doesn't play sound through them.
threads.message: Has the headphone AMP in the Codec chip. Probably dead sound IC if plug is ok.
